fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > At night, choose someone to die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> There is no avoiding death for the target you make die. They will die, regardless of defense, immunity to death, protectives, roleblocks, redirects, controls, ability fails, and transporter-like abilities.

> If you kill a factional leader (Town Power, Fox Head, Serial Killer Head, etc.), you will have to choose to either be roleblocked the next night (this roleblock specifically overrides your first attribute), or lose your defense for the next night. This attribute only applies once.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose dying. (Standard NK Goal)
